titleStmt.title: England and Scotlands covenant with their God in viz, the protestation, the vow, and covenant, and an ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the taking the same / ordered by the Commons in Parliament that these covenants and ordinances bey forthwith printed and published.

England and Scotlands covenant with their God in viz, the protestation, the vow, and covenant, and an ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the taking the same / ordered by the Commons in Parliament that these covenants and ordinances bey forthwith printed and published.

notesStmt.note: "Together with an exhortation made by the Assembly of Divines, an ordinance for the better observation of the Lords-day, an ordinance together with an order for the strict keeping the monthly fast."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
